alert.note: Alert for Essex; Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 3:04PM EDT until September 08 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in northeastern New Jersey... Essex County in northeastern New Jersey... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 304 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clark, or near Linden, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Union around 310 PM EDT. Millburn around 315 PM EDT. Orange around 320 PM EDT. Bloomfield and Caldwell around 335 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
